articles.title: Surplus antioxidants are pathogenic for hearts and skeletal muscle: This discovery may have clinical importance in management of heart failure - Science Daily
articles.description: Oxidative stress can be pathological. Now researchers report that the other end of the redox spectrum, reductive stress, is also pathological. Reductive stress causes pathological heart enlargement and diastolic dysfunction in a mouse model.
